Content.Text:
<FACE_KLAUS><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hm? What am I doing? I'm mixing a fragrance.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
No, this one is not for my work. It's also a hobby
of mine.
<PAGE>
Oh, don't worry. You aren't disturbing me in the
least.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Ah, I know! Since you were kind enough to pay
me a visit today...
<PAGE>
What if I mix a special fragrance just for you, the
busy farmer who spends all day every day
bustling about the farm?

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
It will only take a few minutes. Wait right there.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well? I added a dash of extra chamomile...

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
You think so? That's good to hear.
<PAGE>
It is important to take time to relax and refresh
yourself, especially for someone who works as
hard as you do.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, yes. <MYNAME>, I've just been gifted a few
snacks. How would you like to rest for a bit and
share them with me?
<PAGE>
I don't eat those kinds of sweets often, so if
you'd like, you may have as many as you wish.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Ha ha! It looks like the thought of sweets does
more to refresh you than the fragrance does.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
No, no. I thought your honest reaction was
rather endearing. Would you like some coffee to
drink with it?

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Excellent. Allow me to brew up a special cup of
coffee to go with your sweets.
<PAGE>
Have a seat. I won't take but a moment.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Ha ha! Energizing, is it? I see.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>I'd intended for it to be a soothing scent to help
you relax, but it looks like it's had the opposite
effect on you.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
No, no. That's all right. Just remember that
fragrances don't actually have the ability to give
your body more energy.
<PAGE>
You feel more energetic, but that is only the
emotional side of things. You must be careful
not to push it and exhaust yourself.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Trust me. It is wise to listen to what your elders
say.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Good, good.
<PAGE>
Next time, I will try to mix a fragrance for you
that does relax you.
